snippet.title: Amazon.com: Chopin: 4 Ballades, Barcarolle in F Sharp Major, Op ...
snippet.description: Krystian Zimerman's Chopin is big. He plays this music with a great dynamic range and huge contrasts, with little of the shading we love in Rubinstein's Chopin.
